Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-1CHc (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1; inactive: Palustrin-2CHa)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretions, Chiricahua leopard frog,Lithobates chiricahuensis, Arizona, USA, North America

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC 25726 (MIC 80 uM), S. aureus ATCC 25923 (20 uM), and C. albicans ATCC 90028 (20 uM). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Mechkarska M, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Leprince J, Vaudry H, Kolodziejek J, Nowotny N, King JD.2011
Literature Information.Title: Characterization of antimicrobial peptides in skin secretions from discrete populations of Lithobates chiricahuensis (Ranidae) from central and southern Arizona
